title: Professional Portfolio
description_short: A website showcasing my professional work.
description_full: I can imagine every web developer feels the need to create a personal website at least once.

When I began to plan for mine, I knew I wanted to have the deployed site showcase many types of information in an easy-to-follow, but interesting manner.  The categories I settled upon are the ones you can see in the navigation bar above.
Technologies: Github, Netlify, ES6, ReactJS.  Please see the Github README.md file for more details.
